Item.sqlserver_body:
create procedure affectedItemFloatNewItem(@affectedItemID char(32), @newVersionItemID char(32)) AS BEGIN UPDATE [AFFECTED_ITEM] SET NEW_ITEM_ID = @newVersionItemID WHERE ID = @affectedItemID AND ( NOT EXISTS(select eeco.id from [EXPRESS_ECO] eeco where eeco.id = (select SOURCE_ID from [EXPRESS_ECO_AFFECTED_ITEM] where RELATED_ID = @affectedItemID) AND (eeco.STATE = 'Released')) AND NOT EXISTS(select edco.id from [EXPRESS_DCO] edco where edco.id = (select SOURCE_ID from [EXPRESS_DCO_AFFECTED_ITEM] where RELATED_ID = @affectedItemID) AND (edco.STATE = 'Released')) AND NOT EXISTS(select ecn.id from [ECN] ecn where ecn.id = (select SOURCE_ID from [ECN_AFFECTED_ITEM] where RELATED_ID = @affectedItemID) AND (ecn.STATE = 'Released')) AND NOT EXISTS(select seco.id from [SIMPLE_ECO] seco where seco.id = (select SOURCE_ID from [SIMPLE_ECO_AFFECTED_ITEM] where RELATED_ID = @affectedItemID) AND (seco.STATE = 'Released')) AND NOT EXISTS(select ecr.id from [ECR] ecr where ecr.id = (select SOURCE_ID from [ECR_AFFECTED_ITEM] where RELATED_ID = @affectedItemID) AND (ecr.STATE = 'Released')) )
select * from [AFFECTED_ITEM] where id = @affectedItemID END
Item.name: affectedItemFloatNewItem
